name: Black_Wood_Media_Storage_Tower
reviews: It fits 80 dvd's which is a lot but I just needed something a little bit bigger because we mounted our tv on the wall. Very sturdy and better quality than walmart.

i bought one several months ago. I liked it so much, i bought another one. I have one on each side of the tv, one for our movies and games and the other for my son's. Great quality, so-so on the assembly. My husband is really good at putting things together and put the cabinet together in about 20 minutes.

This was very easy to assemble I just wish it were a bit bigger, I'm going to have to buy another cabinet because I didn't realize I had so many DVD's!. Had to use a piece of wood underneath to level the cabinet as it's on carpet in the basement. It's very attactive and compliments the other dark wood furniture in the room. Assembly directions are very easy to follow as all items are labeled and separately packaged. Hanging the doors was so much easier than I expected.I will purchase a second cabinet for the rest of my DVD's in the near future! Good value for the money.

The 41 inch media tower is small - get out a tape measure and KNOW what 41" looks like in your room. It is perfect for all of our DVD's plus wii games, but it looks a little small in the room. Not the fault of the product - just mentioning so others lay out what it looks like. It is build solidly - not top of the line - but no complaints. I like the fact that it has glass doors = see through, yet still has doors.

This unit is very strong and came with all the necessary connectors and they even included extras as well. I was surprised to see how solid it was upon completion. My only advice is to be careful with the back panel. It is the weakest part of the unit. Oh, and an additional shelf would be nice too!
NICE ITEM.EASY TO PUT TOGETHER.WORTH THE MONEY. I WOULD RECOMMEND IT
The case was better in person was able to hide my DVD's with no problem. It was a perfect match with my television stand.

I couldn't believe the quality of this when I received it. It looks REALLY good. I like that it holds plenty of media and also that it has a safety strap that you can use to attach it to the wall. I just bought a second one of these because of the great value.

Overall, this is a very good item. It looks good. Assembly was not too difficult. The workmanship is good. The doors work fine. I would only caution that you double check the size. It is extreemly small, and the capacity, especially if vhs video tapes are stored, is extreemly limited.

The pictures on here makes you think the media center is big or even medium size but it is really really small and narrow. Something you would put in a child's room rather than your living room. However, it is pretty but not made of wood.
Not hard to put together and the glass front makes it look very nice. I love it!!
Love this little cabinet! Had no intention of using it for a wine cabinet, but that's what it's become! And a cute one, too!!

You really need to look at the measurements when purchasing this - 41 inches is very short. For the price, it doesn't really seem worth it. That being said - the item looks for nice and is of pretty decent workmanship - a few places with gaps, but that is par for the course with these piece-meal assemblies. It was pretty easy to put together. Overall - a decent piece of furniture, but overpriced for what you get.
I was disappointed that when I screwed the doors on, they aren't even. I tried different ways, but they're still not even!

We ordered 2 of these and are able to get quite a few DVDs stored in them. Product was easy to put together and packed very well with no damage. The price is listed as 50% for $99 - I couldn't imagine paying $200 for one of these. It's "average" and smaller than what it appears in the photo. For $99 - it's ok but wouldn't pay any more than that. They do look nice and match our decor.
description:
Keep clutter out of sight with this contemporary media storage tower. This versatile piece features a black finish and silvertone hardware for a look that easily complements your existing living room furniture. Ample space inside the cabinet offers room for books, movies, video games and other accessories. The top of the cabinet even has a place for a small photo frame or other decorative item.
Elegance and function combine to give this contemporary wood DVD tower a striking appearance  Design gives entertainment center a stylish modern look  Tower will accommodate approximately 100 DVDs, Blu-ray discs or other media  Crafted with durable PVC laminate and MDF board  Dimensions:  12 inches wide x 6 inches deep x 41 inches high  Stylish contemporary design  Rich, textured finish  Variable shelf spacing  Ships ready-to-assemble  Assembly instructions with online support  StyleContemporary, Modern, Traditional, TransitionalMaterialGlass, Laminate, MDF, WoodTypeEntertainment Units, Media Cabinets, StorageFinishBlack FinishShelf TypeBookshelves, Display, Media Cabinets, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlackFurniture Frame MaterialWoodFurniture PatternSolidNumber of Shelf4Product FeaturesAdjustable ShelvingWeight CapacityUp To 150 Pounds
